Section.name: About KLMCEW
Section.description:
Kandula Lakshumma Memorial College of Engineering for Women (K.L.M.C.E.W) was established in 2008. The Kandula Group is added with one more feather in its cap through establishing K.L.M College of Engineering for Women. The college is situated beside K.S.R.M, 7K.Ms away from the City Kadapa to Pulivendula state Highway. The college is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Anantapur, Anantapuramu
KLMCEW AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
